thread.title: Russia Urges US to Avoid Leaks, Share Churkin's Cause of Death Probe Data
thread.title_full: Russia Urges US to Avoid Leaks, Share Churkin's Cause of Death Probe Data

title: Russia Urges US to Avoid Leaks, Share Churkin's Cause of Death Probe Data
text:
Russia Urges US to Avoid Leaks, Share Churkin's Cause of Death Probe Data © AP Photo/ John Minchillo Get short URL 0 61 0 0 Moscow is surprised at media leaks of investigations into the cause of death of Russian Ambassador to the United Nations Vitaly Churkin and urges Washington to use official channels in sharing information of this kind, the Russian Foreign Ministry said Wednesday. 
MOSCOW (Sputnik) — Spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said the ministry "learned with bewilderment of leaks in the US media about the course of an investigation into the causes of the Russian ambassador's death." "We believe that this information should be sent to Russia mainly through official channels so that the family is informed, his closed ones should be the first to know the results of the examination," she said at a weekly briefing. 
Churkin passed away in New York on Monday , a day shy of his 65th birthday. ...
